Package imagingbook.common.color.iterate

Interface ColorSequencer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterator<Color>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CssColorSequencer, FiniteLinearColorSequencer, FiniteRandomColorSequencer, RandomHueGenerator
    public interface ColorSequencer
extends Iterator<Color>
    Interface for color sequencers. They are supposed to iterate infinitely, thus hasNext() returns true by default.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default boolean hasNext()  

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.Iterator

        forEachRemaining, next, remove

    • Method Detail

      • hasNext

        default boolean hasNext()
        Specified by:
        hasNext in interface Iterator<Color>
